DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
At the start of the turn, it loses #b HP, and you gain #b HP
You cannot play cards that target the enemy.
When an enemy is sleeping, it will not act until it receives damage. When it receives damage, it will go back to the move prepared before sleeping.
Poison on enemies affected by Toxic go up by the amount of stack instead of going down.
